price: Na srε Nyankopͻn hͻ bͻnefakyε. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
